TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit IsImplicitlyDereferenced extends System.Object
public ref class IsImplicitlyDereferenced abstract sealed

summary.span: 表示修改的記憶體回收參考會表示方法簽章內的參考參數。

span.span: Indicates that the modified garbage collection reference represents a reference parameter within a method signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks C + + 編譯器會使用修飾詞，以區別所傳遞的參考類別受控參考所傳遞 managed 指標。The C++ compiler uses the modifier to distinguish reference classes that are passed by managed reference from those passed by managed pointer. 類別和其合作夥伴類別中，釐清從指標參數的參考參數。The class and its partner, the class, disambiguate reference parameters from pointer parameters. 編譯器會發出中繼資料，以變更在 just-in-time (JIT) 編譯器在沒有適當的預設行為時，會處理值的方式中的自訂修飾詞。Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate. 當 JIT 編譯器遇到的 custom 修飾詞時，它會處理修飾詞指定的方式中的值。When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies. 編譯器可以自訂修飾詞套用至方法、 參數和傳回值。Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values. JIT 編譯器的必要修飾詞必須回應，但可以忽略選擇性修飾詞。The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers. 您可以將自訂修飾詞發出至中繼資料，使用下列技巧的其中一個：You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques: - 使用中的方法這類類別， ， ，和。Using methods in the class such as , , , and . - 產生 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 指令檔，其中包含呼叫`modopt`並`modreq`，並組合的檔案[Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). - 使用 unmanaged 的反映 API。Using the unmanaged reflection API. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何發出使用反映的組件的物件。The following example demonstrates how to emit an object into an assembly using reflection. [!code-cpp[Runtime.CompilerServices.IsImplicitlyDereferenced#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.IsImplicitlyDereferenced/cpp/sample.cpp#1)]
